answers.answer: My water broke with my first, the morning after her due date
Bonnie231. Any suggestions on how my water can break ?
I went into labor on my own with my first.  Second one I got induced bc of gestational diabetes. I am 37 weeks 4 days today and will be induced in 13 days for convenience reasons

Haha all I did was have a big contraction, sit up out of my bed, and poof, my water broke. I'm hoping my water will break early this time, but it seems like it'll just happen on its own whenever the baby is ready
Bonnie231 lol wow. Well goodluck.  I know I saw a little mucus on my tissue a hour ago . You think maybe that's a sign ?
I didn't get induced either.My water broke too, went in and got admitted. Contractions started the moment my water broke. Active labor began 4 hours later and my baby was born 9 hours after that.
I lost some of my mucus plug on thursday.  I read it could be weeks after losing it that you go into labor
My water broke with my first
My water did not break with my first and second. I went into labor and when I was fully dilated, one of the midwives broke it when the baby was coming. I was not induced for any of them.

question: Does all ftm get induced , I barely hear anyone saying they waterbroke .
title: Does all ftm get induced ?
